translations: n．拙劣的工作，糟糕的修补：指做事情时的失误、错误或糟糕的处理。
v．搞砸，弄糟：指在做事情时犯错误或处理不当。

sentences.sentence: If it botches this explanation, the rumour mills will continue to spin.
sentences.translation: 若未解释好，流言将会继续扩散。

sentences.sentence: Robin is sent to work with the Teen Titans after his volatile behavior botches up a Justice League mission.
sentences.translation: 罗宾因自己冒失的行为搞砸了正义联盟的任务，之后他被送往少年泰坦。

sentences.sentence: If a candidate botches the interview but has a good reputation, you may want to consider having someone else interview him.
sentences.translation: 如果应征者搞砸了面试但却名声良好，你可能会考虑让其他人面试他。
